subject: Re: [junit] Keep getting Class Not Found
msgSnippet: ... The GUI test runners don t like running tests in the default package. Put MyClassTest into a named package and try again. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
ampergo wrote:

> The GUI lunches but displays Class not found "MyClassTest" at
> bottom. I looked through the FAQ, and didn't find anything. What
> am I doing wrong?

The GUI test runners don't like running tests in the default package.
Put MyClassTest into a named package and try again.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
